## Yuchen Hua ##
__Yuchen Hua__ currently is a first year students in CUIMC, majoring in [Biostatistics](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/academics/departments/biostatistics) in CUMC, track [Public Health Data Science (PHDS)](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/academics/degrees/master-science/public-health-data-science). 
Yuchen used to be a B.S in Biochemistry from [Brandeis University](https://www.brandeis.edu/). During his undergraduate period, had several research and internships in pharmacy and data science.
You may find more information via this [link](Yuchen-Hua.html)
